_sText:
!NOTE!: To play this map the way it was intended to be played, you have to have only knifes. This makes the map tons harder when fighting bots.




Welcome!

Thank you for choosing me!

To install: 

1. Put files out of archive on your desktop.
2. Click My Computer.
3. Click Local Disk (C:).
4. Click Program Files.
5. Click Valve, then Steam.
6. Click SteamApps, then *Your User Name*.
7. Click Counter-Strike Source then the cstrike file.
8. In the cstrike file, find, then click Maps.
9. Highlight and drag the files taken out of the archive that should be placed on your desktop to the current file you have open (Maps).
10. Now the map(s) are able to be played, start-up Counter-Strike and go to Create Server and under the Maps dopdown find the map you got.
11. Now push Start Server and you should be playing the map! 
12. Enjoy.

-Credits-

Map created by: -Gs-Disposable-Hero (Anti-Hero)
